name: Eric
description:
This is a game based a short story by Shaun Tan about Eric the foreign exchange student who lives in a pantry.

Story text and original book illustrations from Tales from Outer Suburbia by Shaun Tan

ISBN: 0771084021

Published October 28th, 2008 by McClelland & Stewart (first published 2008)
